trans-unit.source: Azure AD Password Reset | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: Azure AD Password Reset | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: Description of password management capabilities in Azure AD, including password reset, change, password management reporting, and writeback to your local on-premises Active Directory.
trans-unit.target: Description of password management capabilities in Azure AD, including password reset, change, password management reporting, and writeback to your local on-premises Active Directory.

trans-unit.source: Azure AD Password Reset for Users and Admins
trans-unit.target: Azure AD Password Reset for Users and Admins

trans-unit.source: [AZURE.IMPORTANT] Are you here because you want to reset your Azure or O365 password?
trans-unit.target: [AZURE.IMPORTANT] Are you here because you want to reset your Azure or O365 password?

trans-unit.source: If so, please [skip to this section](#users-how-to-manage-your-own-password).
trans-unit.target: If so, please [skip to this section](#users-how-to-manage-your-own-password).

trans-unit.source: Self-service has long been a key goal for IT departments across the world as a cost-reduction and labor-saving measure.
trans-unit.target: Self-service has long been a key goal for IT departments across the world as a cost-reduction and labor-saving measure.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, the market is flooded with products that let you manage your on-premises groups, passwords, or user profiles from the cloud or on-premises.
trans-unit.target: Indeed, the market is flooded with products that let you manage your on-premises groups, passwords, or user profiles from the cloud or on-premises.

trans-unit.source: Azure AD sets itself apart from these offerings by providing some of the easiest to use and and most powerful self-service capabilities available today.
trans-unit.target: Azure AD sets itself apart from these offerings by providing some of the easiest to use and and most powerful self-service capabilities available today.

trans-unit.source: **Azure AD Password Management** is a set of capabilities that allow your users to manage any password from any device, at any time, from any location, while remaining in compliance with the security policies you define.
trans-unit.target: **Azure AD Password Management** is a set of capabilities that allow your users to manage any password from any device, at any time, from any location, while remaining in compliance with the security policies you define.

trans-unit.source: USERS: How to manage your own password
trans-unit.target: USERS: How to manage your own password

trans-unit.source: If you're a user (not an admin) in an organization that uses Office 365 or Microsoft Accounts to access work resources, click the links below to learn how to fix common problems with your password.
trans-unit.target: If you're a user (not an admin) in an organization that uses Office 365 or Microsoft Accounts to access work resources, click the links below to learn how to fix common problems with your password.

trans-unit.source: What is possible with Azure AD Password Reset?
trans-unit.target: What is possible with Azure AD Password Reset?

trans-unit.source: Here are some of the things you can do with Azure AD's password management capabilities.
trans-unit.target: Here are some of the things you can do with Azure AD's password management capabilities.

trans-unit.source: **Self-service password change** allows end users or administrators to change their expired or non-expired passwords without calling an administrator or helpdesk for support.
trans-unit.target: **Self-service password change** allows end users or administrators to change their expired or non-expired passwords without calling an administrator or helpdesk for support.

trans-unit.source: **Self-service password reset** allows end users or administrators to reset their passwords automatically without calling an administrator or helpdesk for support.
trans-unit.target: **Self-service password reset** allows end users or administrators to reset their passwords automatically without calling an administrator or helpdesk for support.

trans-unit.source: Self-service password reset requires Azure AD Premium or Basic.
trans-unit.target: Self-service password reset requires Azure AD Premium or Basic.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see Azure Active Directory Editions.
trans-unit.target: For more information, see Azure Active Directory Editions.

trans-unit.source: **Administrator-initiated password reset** allows an administrator to reset an end user’s or another administrator’s password from within the [Azure Management Portal](https://manage.windowsazure.com).
trans-unit.target: **Administrator-initiated password reset** allows an administrator to reset an end user’s or another administrator’s password from within the [Azure Management Portal](https://manage.windowsazure.com).

trans-unit.source: **Password management activity reports** give administrators insights into password reset and registration activity occurring in their organization.
trans-unit.target: **Password management activity reports** give administrators insights into password reset and registration activity occurring in their organization.

trans-unit.source: **Password Writeback** allows management of on-premises passwords from the cloud so all of the above scenarios can be performed by, or on the behalf of, federated or password synchronized users.
trans-unit.target: **Password Writeback** allows management of on-premises passwords from the cloud so all of the above scenarios can be performed by, or on the behalf of, federated or password synchronized users.

trans-unit.source: Password Writeback requires Azure AD Premium.
trans-unit.target: Password Writeback requires Azure AD Premium.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see Getting started with Azure AD Premium.
trans-unit.target: For more information, see Getting started with Azure AD Premium.

trans-unit.source: Why use Azure AD Password Reset?
trans-unit.target: Why use Azure AD Password Reset?

trans-unit.source: Here are some of the reasons you should use Azure AD's password management capabilities
trans-unit.target: Here are some of the reasons you should use Azure AD's password management capabilities

trans-unit.source: **Reduce costs** - support-assisted password reset is typically 20% of organization's IT spend
trans-unit.target: **Reduce costs** - support-assisted password reset is typically 20% of organization's IT spend

trans-unit.source: **Improve user experiences** - users don't want to call helpdesk and spend an hour on the phone every time they forget their passwords
trans-unit.target: **Improve user experiences** - users don't want to call helpdesk and spend an hour on the phone every time they forget their passwords

trans-unit.source: **Lower helpdesk volumes** - password management is the single largest helpdesk driver for most organizations
trans-unit.target: **Lower helpdesk volumes** - password management is the single largest helpdesk driver for most organizations

trans-unit.source: **Enable mobility** - users can reset their passwords from wherever they are
trans-unit.target: **Enable mobility** - users can reset their passwords from wherever they are

trans-unit.source: Pricing and availability
trans-unit.target: Pricing and availability

trans-unit.source: Azure AD Password Reset is available in 3 tiers, depending on which subscription you have:
trans-unit.target: Azure AD Password Reset is available in 3 tiers, depending on which subscription you have:

trans-unit.source: **Azure AD Free** - cloud-only administrators can reset their own passwords
trans-unit.target: **Azure AD Free** - cloud-only administrators can reset their own passwords

trans-unit.source: **Azure AD Basic or any Paid O365 Subscription** - cloud-only users and cloud-only administrators can reset their own passwords
trans-unit.target: **Azure AD Basic or any Paid O365 Subscription** - cloud-only users and cloud-only administrators can reset their own passwords

trans-unit.source: **Azure AD Premium** - any user or administrator, including cloud-only, federated, or password synced users, can reset their own passwords (requires [password writeback to be enabled](active-directory-passwords-getting-started.md#enable-users-to-reset-or-change-their-ad-passwords))
trans-unit.target: **Azure AD Premium** - any user or administrator, including cloud-only, federated, or password synced users, can reset their own passwords (requires [password writeback to be enabled](active-directory-passwords-getting-started.md#enable-users-to-reset-or-change-their-ad-passwords))

trans-unit.source: For more information on Azure AD Premium or Basic pricing, visit the [Active Directory Pricing Details](https://azure.microsoft.com/pricing/details/active-directory/) page.
trans-unit.target: For more information on Azure AD Premium or Basic pricing, visit the [Active Directory Pricing Details](https://azure.microsoft.com/pricing/details/active-directory/) page.

trans-unit.source: Recent service updates
trans-unit.target: Recent service updates

trans-unit.source: Enforce Password Reset Registration at Sign-In to Office 365 Apps - November 2015
trans-unit.target: Enforce Password Reset Registration at Sign-In to Office 365 Apps - November 2015

trans-unit.source: Now, after enabling the [enforced registration](active-directory-passwords-customize.md#require-users-to-register-when-signing-in) feature, your users will be required to register from anywhere they sign in with a work or school account.
trans-unit.target: Now, after enabling the [enforced registration](active-directory-passwords-customize.md#require-users-to-register-when-signing-in) feature, your users will be required to register from anywhere they sign in with a work or school account.

trans-unit.source: This dramatically increases the speed at which many organizations can onboard to password reset.
trans-unit.target: This dramatically increases the speed at which many organizations can onboard to password reset.

trans-unit.source: With this new feature we've seen large organizations onboarding in as little as 2 weeks!
trans-unit.target: With this new feature we've seen large organizations onboarding in as little as 2 weeks!

trans-unit.source: Support for Unlocking Active Directory Accounts without Resetting a Password - November 2015
trans-unit.target: Support for Unlocking Active Directory Accounts without Resetting a Password - November 2015

trans-unit.source: Unlock only (without reset) is a huge helpdesk driver these days.
trans-unit.target: Unlock only (without reset) is a huge helpdesk driver these days.

trans-unit.source: In fact, many organizations spend up to 70% of their password reset budget unlocking accounts!
trans-unit.target: In fact, many organizations spend up to 70% of their password reset budget unlocking accounts!

trans-unit.source: To meet this demand, now with Azure AD Password reset, you can enable a feature to let your users unlock AD accounts separately from password reset.
trans-unit.target: To meet this demand, now with Azure AD Password reset, you can enable a feature to let your users unlock AD accounts separately from password reset.

trans-unit.source: Check out how to turn it on here: [Setting: enable users to unlock their AD accounts without resetting a password](active-directory-passwords-customize.md#allow-users-to-unlock-accounts-without-resetting-their-password).
trans-unit.target: Check out how to turn it on here: [Setting: enable users to unlock their AD accounts without resetting a password](active-directory-passwords-customize.md#allow-users-to-unlock-accounts-without-resetting-their-password).

trans-unit.source: Usability updates to Registration Page - October 2015
trans-unit.target: Usability updates to Registration Page - October 2015

trans-unit.source: Now, when a user has data already registered, he or she can just click "looks good" to update the data without needing to re-send the email or phone call.
trans-unit.target: Now, when a user has data already registered, he or she can just click "looks good" to update the data without needing to re-send the email or phone call.

trans-unit.source: Improved Reliability of Password Writeback - September 2015
trans-unit.target: Improved Reliability of Password Writeback - September 2015

trans-unit.source: As of the September release of Azure AD Connect, the password writeback agent will now more agressively retry connections and additional, more robust, failover capabilities.
trans-unit.target: As of the September release of Azure AD Connect, the password writeback agent will now more agressively retry connections and additional, more robust, failover capabilities.

trans-unit.source: API for Retrieving Password Reset Reporting Data - August 2015
trans-unit.target: API for Retrieving Password Reset Reporting Data - August 2015

trans-unit.source: Now, the data behind the password reset reports can be retrieved directly from the [Azure AD Reports and Events API](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/azure/mt126081.aspx#BKMK_SsprActivityEvent).
trans-unit.target: Now, the data behind the password reset reports can be retrieved directly from the [Azure AD Reports and Events API](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/azure/mt126081.aspx#BKMK_SsprActivityEvent).

trans-unit.source: Support for Azure AD Password Reset During Cloud Domain Join - August 2015
trans-unit.target: Support for Azure AD Password Reset During Cloud Domain Join - August 2015

trans-unit.source: Now, any cloud user can reset his or her password right from the Windows 10 sign in screen during the cloud domain join onboarding experience.
trans-unit.target: Now, any cloud user can reset his or her password right from the Windows 10 sign in screen during the cloud domain join onboarding experience.

trans-unit.source: Note, this is not yet exposed on the Windows 10 sign in screen.
trans-unit.target: Note, this is not yet exposed on the Windows 10 sign in screen.

trans-unit.source: Enforce Password Reset Registration at Sign-In to Azure and Federated Apps - July 2015
trans-unit.target: Enforce Password Reset Registration at Sign-In to Azure and Federated Apps - July 2015

trans-unit.source: In addition to enforcing registration when signing into myapps.microsoft.com, we now support enforcing registration during sign ins to the Azure Management Portal and any of your federated single-sign on applications
trans-unit.target: In addition to enforcing registration when signing into myapps.microsoft.com, we now support enforcing registration during sign ins to the Azure Management Portal and any of your federated single-sign on applications

trans-unit.source: Security Question Localization Support - May 2015
trans-unit.target: Security Question Localization Support - May 2015

trans-unit.source: Now, you have the option to select pre-defined security questions which are localized in the full O365 language set when configuring Security Questions for password reset.
trans-unit.target: Now, you have the option to select pre-defined security questions which are localized in the full O365 language set when configuring Security Questions for password reset.

trans-unit.source: Account Unlock Support during Password Reset - June 2015
trans-unit.target: Account Unlock Support during Password Reset - June 2015

trans-unit.source: If you're using password writeback and you reset your password when your account is locked, we'll automatically unlock your Active Directory account!
trans-unit.target: If you're using password writeback and you reset your password when your account is locked, we'll automatically unlock your Active Directory account!

trans-unit.source: Branded SSPR Registration - April 2015
trans-unit.target: Branded SSPR Registration - April 2015

trans-unit.source: The password reset reigstration page is now branded with your company logo!
trans-unit.target: The password reset reigstration page is now branded with your company logo!

trans-unit.source: Security Questions - March 2015
trans-unit.target: Security Questions - March 2015

trans-unit.source: We released security questions to GA!
trans-unit.target: We released security questions to GA!

trans-unit.source: Account Unlock - March 2015
trans-unit.target: Account Unlock - March 2015

trans-unit.source: Now users can unlock their accounts when password reset occurs
trans-unit.target: Now users can unlock their accounts when password reset occurs

trans-unit.source: Coming soon
trans-unit.target: Coming soon

trans-unit.source: Below are some of the cool features we're working on right now!
trans-unit.target: Below are some of the cool features we're working on right now!

trans-unit.source: **Support for Reminding Users to Update their Registered Data During Sign-in** - Work in progress
trans-unit.target: **Support for Reminding Users to Update their Registered Data During Sign-in** - Work in progress

trans-unit.source: Today, we support reminding users to update their registered data when accessing myapps.microsoft.com, but we're working on the ability to do so for all sign ins.
trans-unit.target: Today, we support reminding users to update their registered data when accessing myapps.microsoft.com, but we're working on the ability to do so for all sign ins.
